name: kohtravel
description: Travel planning and management web application

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && PORT=3000 npm run dev" "cd api && PORT=8000 uv run --with fastapi --with uvicorn --with python-multipart --with psycopg2-binary --with python-dotenv uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "./scripts/dev-agent.sh"
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.dev:api: cd api && PORT=8000 uv run --with fastapi --with uvicorn --with python-multipart --with psycopg2-binary --with python-dotenv uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:migrate: cd api && uv run --with alembic --with python-dotenv alembic upgrade head
